title: 一個維基page證明香港有幾仇女

replies.msg:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gong_nui

The word Gong Nui (Chinese: 港女) can be directly translated to "Hong Kong Girls" and is commonly used on Hong Kong Internet forums as well as in the press. It represents a negative stereotype portraying Hong Kong women as worshiping money, narcissistic, being obsessed with foreign culture, and suffering from the so-called "Princess Syndrome" which means girls or non-married women requesting others to treat her like a princess.[1]
